pr_title: Fix address book update always updating 102 file

timeline.message:
Fix address book update always updating 102 file

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

Add address book migration

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

timeline.bodyText: For complete coverage we could add a test case where both a 101 and 102 are updated, or where only one of them is updated. In either case it would verify the other addressBook entry isn't modified.
timeline.author: Nana-EC

replies.bodyText: I added a verify101DoesntUpdate102 test case
replies.author: steven-sheehy

timeline.message:
Address review feedback
